name: ActionBarComponent

inputsClass.name: hasHeader
inputsClass.rawdescription: Identifies if the current view has a header element.
inputsClass.description: Identifies if the current view has a header element.

inputsClass.name: hasTabs
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Identifies if the current view has tabs. If yes, the action bar needs
to move down.
inputsClass.description: Identifies if the current view has tabs. If yes, the action bar needs to move down.

inputsClass.name: isTabsHorizontal
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Identifies if the tabs are aligned horizontally. If yes, the tabs don't
need to move to the left.
inputsClass.description: Identifies if the tabs are aligned horizontally. If yes, the tabs don't need to move to the left.

inputsClass.name: items$
inputsClass.rawdescription: The current items to display in the ActionBar.
inputsClass.description: The current items to display in the ActionBar.

inputsClass.name: navigatorOpen
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Identifies if the navigator is opened. If yes, the action-bar
needs to move to the right.
inputsClass.description: Identifies if the navigator is opened. If yes, the action-bar needs to move to the right.

propertiesClass.name: hidden
propertiesClass.description: Binds hidden property to this component's native element
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Binds hidden property to this component's native element

propertiesClass.name: hidden$
propertiesClass.description: Returns true if no items are present and hides the action bar.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Returns true if no items are present and hides the action bar.

propertiesClass.name: isPageToolbarExpanded
propertiesClass.description: Identifies if in a mobile view the toolbar is expanded or not.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Identifies if in a mobile view the toolbar is expanded or not.

propertiesClass.name: left$
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Provides observable for left action items.

propertiesClass.name: more$
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Provides observable for more action items.

propertiesClass.name: right$
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Provides observable for right action items.

hostBindings.name: hidden
hostBindings.rawdescription: Binds hidden property to this component's native element
hostBindings.description: Binds hidden property to this component's native element

description: This component is used as the outlet to show the action bars. In a c8ycli app it is by default placed on the bootstrap component.
rawdescription:
This component is used as the outlet to show the action bars.
In a c8ycli app it is by default placed on the bootstrap component.
